execution_quality: The agent made progress troubleshooting certificate issues but ultimately failed to resolve the core problem—the user encountered a different error (missing split APK) when attempting installation.
work_category: Debugging SSL/TLS certificate errors in an Android development environment, with attempts to install a modified APK on a device.
summary: The agent addressed SSL certificate errors through edits and bash commands but didn't fully resolve the underlying issue. When the user attempted to proceed with their actual goal (installing the APK), they hit a different error (missing split APK), indicating the prior work may have missed the root cause or there were other blockers the agent didn't anticipate. The user's follow-up suggests significant misalignment between what the agent fixed and what was actually needed.
follow_up_pattern: User is reporting a new blocker encountered after the agent's work. The continuation suggests they tried to apply the agent's solution and hit an unexpected installation failure.
